thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: Fedmundson
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Fedmundson

author: Fedmundson
title: Fedmundson
text: Hiring in Spain can be a minefield, even with some of the big names. Get a cheap Quote: and when you get there get hit for the rest. Watch out for the cheap upgrade scam from E r. Go for the full package with centauro. I've been hiring from them for over 10 years and never had a problem. Took the car back last week a day early and they refunded me for the unused day on the spot without me asking, didn't expect it .
